channel.title: Mini GE
channel.description:
Hey guys,
Has anyone coded a mini GE that i can use on battlescape2000... Like it works the same way as the GE or similar and would work on my PVP barrage source server [317].
If so, please go into a alot of detail about where to put the code and all the steps etc because i am a beginner.
Thanks.

item.title: Mini GE
item.dc:creator: @_ZeroScape `ZeroScape
item.description:
@_ZeroScape wrote:

Can possibly be done. Add davew@live.no and I’ll try to see if I can help you.

Read full topic
